title: 2025 Firefighter Academy Dates Announced
lede: SJIF&R Announces 2025 Structure/Wildland Firefighting Academy Dates
body:
Hybrid academy with hands-on skills weekends beginning January 6th. Graduating participants will be fully qualified as structure and wildland firefighters by end of academy March 31st.

If you are interested, please complete a 

[Volunteer Application](/assets/images/volunteer-application.pdf)

and submit via email or in person to:

San Juan Island Fire & Rescue
1011 Mullis St.
Email: kkuetzing@sjifire.org

Applications must be received by close of business December 15
